sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
lightens
ali
is lightened
, postane manj temno.

seg.quote: After the rain stops, the sky lightens a little.
Constant exposure to the sun had lightened my hair.

sense.def:
To lighten something
pomeni tudi narediti nekaj manj težko.

seg.quote: They began to lighten their products in an effort to increase sales.

sense.def:
Kadar človekov obraz ali izraz na njem
lightens
, postane bolj vesel, srečen in sproščen.
